nodes.text: Transport Depot was a transportation hub in Mos Eisley, offering transport to almost any other settlement on the planet Tatooine. It was also the beginning and end-point of the Circle Route around the Jundland Wastes. The proprietor, Yvonne Targis, worked for Jabba Desilijic Tiure, who used the depot as a drop-off point for smugglers.

Transport Depot was supposed to launch a transport along the Circle Route every three days, but Yvonne Targis would only allow the R2-series astromech droid pilot to leave if there were at least four beings with paid tickets. Even then, the transports are rarely on schedule.
